lessons.title: Use tangent to find a length
learningObjectives: In this lesson we'll learn how to correctly label a right-angled triangle

lessons.title: Use sine and cosine to find a length
learningObjectives: In this lesson, we will calculate missing lengths using sine and cosine trigonometric ratios.

lessons.title: Know tangent, sine and cosine
learningObjectives: In this lesson, we will learn how to correctly label a right-angled triangle, and identify the correct trigonometric ratio to use.
